title: [Solhaven, Liabo Esplanade]
description: A waist-high black iron and golden glaes fence surrounds the grounds of Eonak's Temple to the north.  No gate or archway marks the entrance, yet a broad, flagstone road leads from the esplanade towards the stone bulk of the temple.  Columns of heat-distorted air rise from the squat domes of the charcoal furnaces and the forges ranged beyond the temple proper.

A tall black iron and white imflass fence encircles the grounds of Fasthr's Lance to the north.  Winding through a spade-topped stygian steel gate, a broad flagstone road leads from the esplanade toward the stone bulk of the tower.  Whitewashed and tall, the tower rises from a courtyard atop a green hillock.
